Website Build

This website is built with GitHub Pages and Jekyll. There are two sources that deserve credit for the template design of this site. For the site I used William Barbour’s derivative of Michael Rose’s hpstr-jekyll-theme. Michael Rose’s template is available on his Github.

Please feel free to clone or download these website materials and adapt as you see fit. For A detailed set of instructions on using these materials see William Barbour’s theme-setup. Please make sure to give credit to Michael Rose (the original template) and if using my derivative, William Barbour as well.

The only major change I made to the template was I added a publication list on the research page. To use this feature simply replace the _bibliography/refs.bib file with your own latex bibliography file. Also make sure to include gem “jekyll-scholar” in the Gemfile, and in _config.yml include “jekyll-scholar” in the plugins section.

Updated on September 20, 2020 Mike
